text:
Hi all, I am Matthew Monahemi and I am the director of R&D for a healthcare startup based out of NYC. The company is called Muru Inc and is a healthcare saas/data science company. We are provdindg like saving information digital to paramedics and combat medics world wide. We are currently looking for full timer and part timer software engineers. we currently have one android on our team as well as beinf advised by our tech advisor Elijah Meerson, the Director of Software Engineering for Flatiron Health. The company website is www.murumed.com If you are interested, please email me at mm@murumed.com.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/murumed/ Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/muru-inc/
